menu.name: Brewed Coffee
menu.desc: Delicous coffee ready when you order!

menu.name: Pour Over
menu.desc: One of our specialty coffees made just for you, right when you order it!Delicous coffee ready when you order!

menu.name: Espresso
menu.desc: Enjoy a shot of the best espresso in town!

menu.name: Affogato
menu.desc: A delicous scoop of vanilla icecream with a shot of espresso poured over the top. Perfect for a hot day or afternoon treat!

menu.name: Macchlato
menu.desc: A double shot of espresso with a small amount of steamed milk.

menu.name: Cappuccino
menu.desc: A double shot of espresso, 2 ounces milk, 2 ounces foam.

menu.name: Latte
menu.desc: A Double shot of espresso, with 6 ounces of perfectly steamed milk.

menu.name: Au Lalt
menu.desc: Half regular coffee and half steamed milk.

menu.name: Bullseye
menu.desc: A cup of perfectly brewed coffee with a double shot of espresso.

menu.name: Rishi Tea
menu.desc: Choose from a variety of our organic loose leaf teas.

menu.name: Mocha
menu.desc: A double shot espresso, steamed milk, and our homemade chocolate sauce.

menu.name: Gold Rush
menu.desc: A double shot espresso, steamed milk, and our homemade caramel sauce.

menu.name: Maple Leaf
menu.desc: A double shot espresso, steamed milk, and PURE maple syrup.

menu.name: Liquid Gold
menu.desc: A double shot espresso, steamed milk, our homemade caramel sauce paired with our signature honey-vanilla syrup.Choose from a variety of our organic loose leaf teas.

menu.name: Chai Latte
menu.desc: Chai tea and steamed milk combined for the perfect Chai Latte experience.

menu.name: Iced Coffee
menu.desc: Chai tea and steamed milk combined for the perfect Chai Latte experience.Our coffee from Counter Culture Coffee is brewed using the Japanese Iced Coffee method to lock in all the delicious aromas and flavors of the coffee. Made fresh daily so your iced coffee NEVER tastes old.

menu.name: Ice Latte
menu.desc: A double shot espresso and milk poured directly over ice.

menu.name: Iced Honey Vanilla Latte
menu.desc: A double shot espresso, milk, and our signature honey-vanilla syrup poured directly over ice.

menu.name: Iced Honey Vanilla Chai
menu.desc: Chai tea, milk, and our signature honey-vanilla syrup combined over ice for a delicious treat.

menu.name: Mexican Mud Slinger
menu.desc: A must try! Real sugar Mexican coke mixed with a double shot espresso, and vanilla syrup poured over ice! You must try this, at least once!

menu.name: Chai Latte
menu.desc: Chai tea and steamed milk combined for the perfect Chai Latte experience.

menu.name: Blueberry Muffin
menu.desc: Loaded with blueberries, our blueberry muffin is made using fresh blueberries and topped with a brown sugar pecan crumble. Perfect start to a guaranteed good day!

menu.name: Banana Walnut Muffins
menu.desc: A morning must have! The sweet combination of banana, brown sugar and walnuts is sure to satisfy any morning appetite.

menu.name: Peach Cobbler Muffins
menu.desc: If you’re from Georgia and can’t seem to resist a Georgia Peach then these muffins are for you. Stuffed with peaches and paired with brown sugar. Your tummy with surely thank you.

menu.name: Lemon Blueberry Scone
menu.desc: Our mouthwatering homemade scone filled with blueberries and topped with a subtle lemon glaze.

menu.name: Starwberry
menu.desc: ur mouthwatering homemade scone filled with strawberries and topped with a strawberry creme drizzle.

menu.name: Bacon Cheddar Scone
menu.desc: Want something savory for your morning meal or even for an afternoon snack? Then this scone is the right choice. Filled with bacon and cheddar cheese, it is delicious when drizzled with our pure maple syrup.

menu.name: Bagels
menu.desc: Choose from our variety of plain, multigrain, cinnamon raisin, or everything bagels. Served with your choice of our handmade Plain, Brown Sugar Cinnamon, or Honey Walnut cream cheese.

menu.name: Original Cheesecake
menu.desc: Choose from our variety of plain, multigrain, cinnamon raisin, or everything bagels. Served with your choice of our handmade Plain, Brown Sugar Cinnamon, or Honey Walnut cream cheese.This isn’t your everyday cheesecake. Homemade in our kitchen this cheesecake has a flawless texture, a deliciously surprising crust, and a hint of lemon. This cheesecake is an excellent choice for a dessert lover like you.

menu.name: Almond Pound Cake
menu.desc: Better than your mama’s pound cake. This is serious. A soft, moist almond flavored pound cake with a crunchy, melt in your mouth pound cake crust. You won’t be disappointed.
